S1.name: Strike of Flagbearer
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a flag, with a 75% chance to silence for 1 turn. If the enemy is silenced after the attack, decreases Combat Readiness by 25%.

S2.name: Target Lock
S2.description: After dispelling all buffs from a single enemy, has a 100% chance to inflict Target for 2 turns, and all allies except the caster attack the enemy with a basic skill. Increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 30%.

S3.name: Flag of Victory
S3.description: Dispels two buffs from all enemies before a 100% chance to inflict Fear for 2 turns and decrease Combat Readiness by 20%. Grants increased Speed to all allies for 2 turns. At the start of the first battle, grants increased Evasion to the caster for 2 turns.

S1.name: Reaper's Scythe
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with Sigurd Scythe, before increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 20%. When used on the caster's turn, activates Final Deliverance as an extra attack. Final Deliverance: Attacks all enemies, before granting stealth to the caster for 1 turn and decreasing skill cooldowns by 2 turns.

S2.name: Death's Dominion
S2.description: Enemy Heroes cannot revive and cannot be granted immortality. When attacking, penetrates the target's Defense by 85%, and cannot trigger a critical hit or a heavy blow.

S3.name: Inescapable Demise
S3.description: After granting increased Attack to the caster for 3 turns, attacks the enemy by releasing the force of the netherworld. When the target is a Hero, ignores damage share. Begins the first battle with a full skill cooldown count.

S1.name: Ambush
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with bloodied wings, and increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 15%. When used on the caster's turn, has a 35% chance to activate Might as an extra effect. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S2.name: Blood Banquet
S2.description: At the start of the turn, curses the enemy with the highest Attack for 1 turn. When the ally in the back row except for the caster receives lethal damage, consumes 30% of the caster's current Health, dispelling all debuffs from the target, before granting immortality and vampirism for 1 turn.

S3.name: Scarlet Garden
S3.description: After dispelling all buffs from the enemy, attacks with a field of bloody thorns. Increases Effectiveness of this attack by 50% and damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S1.name: Magic Design
S1.description: Attacks with a staff, with a 50% chance to decrease Attack for 2 turns.

S2.name: Rapid Cure
S2.description: Recovers an ally's Health and grants a barrier for 1 turn, before decreasing skill cooldown by 1 turn. Amount recovered and barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Max Health.

S3.name: Curing Prayer
S3.description: Dispels debuffs from all allies before healing them. Healing increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S1.name: Ankle Cut
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a sword, increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 20%.

S2.name: Blade Gust
S2.description: Attacks all enemies with a blade gust, with an 80% chance to make them unable to be buffed for 2 turns. When there are three or fewer enemies, damage dealt increases with fewer enemies.

S3.name: Lightning Bolt
S3.description: Attacks the enemy repeatedly, granting Weakness Shared to the caster for 2 turns. A critical hit has a 100% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.

S1.name: Mana Release
S1.description: Attacks with the power of a magical tome, with a 35% chance to stun for 1 turn.

S2.name: Heroism
S2.description: Combat Readiness increases by 12% every time an ally except for the caster is attacked.

S3.name: Mana Seal
S3.description: Deals huge damage to all enemies with a sealing spell, with a 170% chance to dispel one buff, before a 170% chance to increase skill cooldowns by 1 turn.

S1.name: X-Slash
S1.description: Attacks with a sword, dealing damage proportional to the caster's max Health.

S2.name: Command Strike
S2.description: Attacks the enemy repeatedly, before triggering a Dual Attack from the ally with the highest Attack.

S3.name: Purifying Flame
S3.description: Strongly attacks all enemies with a swordstorm, before recovering the caster's Health and increasing Defense of all allies for 2 turns. Amount recovered and damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S1.name: Silent Fire
S1.description: Silently shoots the enemy, with a 75% chance to decrease Defense for 1 turn.

S2.name: Maneuver Support
S2.description: At the end of the turn, increases Combat Readiness of the ally except for the caster with the highest Attack by 20%.

S3.name: Firepower Cube
S3.description: Throws a firepower cube to attack all enemies, before healing all allies and granting increased Attack and Speed for 2 turns. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

S1.name: Icy Sword Storm
S1.description: Attacks with a sword, with a 75% chance to provoke for 1 turn. Removes 4 Souls from the opponent. When the caster is enraged, ignores Effect Resistance. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S2.name: Battle Command
S2.description: After being attacked, when an ally has a debuff, has a 100% chance to dispel one debuff from all allies, and enrages the caster for 1 turn. Can only activate once per turn.

S3.name: Flash
S3.description: Attacks all enemies with an instant swordstorm, with an 80% chance to stun for 1 turn. When the caster is enraged, ignores Effect Resistance. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S1.name: Sleep Sorcery
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with water energy, with a 50% chance to put them to sleep for 1 turn.

S2.name: Purification
S2.description: Dispels one debuff from all allies and heals debuffed allies. Amount recovered is proportional to the ally's max Health.

S3.name: Earnest Prayer
S3.description: Dispels two debuffs from an ally before recovering Health and granting immunity for 2 turns. Amount recovered increases proportional to the ally's max Health.

S1.name: Holy Strike
S1.description: Attacks with a staff, with a 25% chance to stun for 1 turn.

S2.name: Origin of Life
S2.description: Recovers ally's Health with healing power. Amount recovered is proportional to the caster's max Health.

S3.name: Guide of the Goddess
S3.description: Recovers the Health of all allies and grants a barrier and immunity for 2 turns. Amount recovered and barrier strength are proportional to the Caster's max Health.

S1.name: Spectral Axe
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with an axe, inflicting injuries before absorbing some of the damage as Health. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health. The severity of injuries increases proportional to damage dealt. Injuries decrease max Health of the target by up to 10% every time this skill is used.

S2.name: War God's Might
S2.description: Increases Critical Hit Chance by 30%. Starts the first battle with 50 Fighting Spirit. At the moment the caster is attacked, consumes 10 Fighting Spirit to increase Combat Readiness of the caster by 15% and recovers the caster's Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S3.name: Deliverance: Soul Exchange
S3.description: Delivers divine judgment down upon the enemy. When the enemy is defeated, revives one random dead ally with 15% Health and grants skill nullifier once. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health. Damage dealt by this skill increases every time somebody dies. Effect can only stack up to 3 times.

S1.name: Ignite
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with an explosion of flames, with a 50% chance to burn for 1 turn.

S2.name: Catalyst
S2.description: Attacks all enemies with a catalytic explosion, dispelling two buffs and making them unhealable for 2 turns, before increasing Attack of all allies for 2 turns. For each unhealable inflicted, increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 30%.

S3.name: Fire Pillar
S3.description: Attacks all enemies with a massive fire pillar, with a 100% chance each to inflict two burn effects for 2 turns and a 100% chance to stun for 1 turn. Grants a barrier to the caster for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Attack.

S1.name: Sweep
S1.description: Rapidly attacks two enemies with a swordstorm, with a 50% chance to decrease their Combat Readiness by 15%.

S2.name: Dark Contract
S2.description: Upon receiving lethal damage, regenerates to 100% Health, increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 100%, fully recovers the caster's Focus, and resets skill cooldown of Dark Blade.

S3.name: Dark Blade
S3.description: Attacks all enemies, decreasing Hit Chance for 2 turns. When Focus is full, consumes it all, increasing damage dealt. When the enemy is defeated with this skill, cooldown does not occur.

S1.name: Shadow Call
S1.description: Attacks two enemies with shadows, with a 50% chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn. When it is not the caster's turn, increases effect chance by 20%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

S2.name: Guide of Darkness
S2.description: Increases Critical Hit Chance by 30%. After using a skill, when Focus is full, consumes all Focus to activate Dark Shadow Phantom. Dark Shadow Phantom: Attacks all enemies, dispelling two buffs and decreasing Combat Readiness by 30%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

S3.name: The Umbral Hour
S3.description: Using the power of the shadows, increases Defense of the caster and adopts a counterattacking stance for 2 turns. Grants stealth and barrier to all allies except for the caster for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

S1.name: Shield Thrust
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a sword and shield, with a 75% chance each to dispel one buff twice. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S2.name: Escort
S2.description: At the start of battle and at the end of the caster's turn, grants escort to the caster for 1 turn. After an ally except for the caster is attacked by a Single Attack, increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 10%.

S3.name: Defensive Position
S3.description: Attacks the enemy, with a 100% chance to stun for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S1.name: Tatami Gaeshi
S1.description: Attacks the enemy repeatedly, with a 70% chance each to inflict two bleeding effects for 2 turns. A critical hit will reduce the caster's skill cooldowns by 1 turn.

S2.name: Tsurane Sanzu-watashi
S2.description: Attacks the enemy with expert swordsmanship, with an 80% chance each of inflicting three bleeding effects for 2 turns. One bleeding effect ignores Effect Resistance. If a critical hit is made, grants an extra turn.

S3.name: Garyo Tensei
S3.description: Delivers a deadly blow, detonating any bleeding effects inflicted on the enemy at the end of the turn. A critical hit increases the Combat Readiness of all allies by 25%.

S1.name: Sand Wind
S1.description: Attacks with wind magic. When the caster is debuffed, has a 75% chance to transfer one debuff from the caster to the enemy and inflict a random debuff for 2 turns.

S2.name: Hurricane
S2.description: Attacks all enemies by releasing a hot sand hurricane, with a 75% chance each to decrease Hit Chance and Attack for 2 turns.

S3.name: Sandstorm
S3.description: Attacks all enemies with sand magic, dispelling all buffs and decreasing Combat Readiness by 30%, before making them unable to be buffed for 2 turns.

S1.name: Light of Destruction
S1.description: Attacks all enemies with a ray, with a 65% chance to dispel one buff. When used on the caster's turn, has a 35% chance to activate Incursion as an extra attack. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health. Incursion: Attacks all enemies, decreasing Speed and Hit Chance for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S2.name: Shackles of Suppression
S2.description: Decreases the amount of Soul acquired by the enemy by 100%. At the start of the turn, has a 100% chance to grant a random buff to the caster for 1 turn.

S3.name: Apocalypse
S3.description: Attacks all enemies with the power of duties, decreasing Combat Readiness by a random amount between 10% and 30% and provokes for 1 turn. Increases Defense of the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S1.name: Windbreak Fan
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a fan, dealing damage proportional to the enemy's max Health. When the caster's stacked Focus is 5 or more, consumes all Focus and activates Razorwind Fan.

S2.name: Butterfly Fan
S2.description: Attacks all enemies by waving a fan.

S3.name: Razorwind Fan
S3.description: Attacks all enemies by creating a powerful gust of wind, with a 100% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. Increases damage dealt when Razorwind Fan is triggered by Windbreak Fan.

S1.name: Move Out of the Way
S1.description: Cuts the enemy to attack. When the caster is granted Multilayer Barrier, increases damage dealt.

S2.name: Universal Perception
S2.description: At the start of the first battle, gains 50 Fighting Spirit. At the start of an enemy's extra turn, dispels all debuffs from the caster and grants Multilayer Barrier for 2 turns before increasing Combat Readiness by 40%. The effect following an enemy's extra turn can only be activated once every 2 turns. After attacking, when Fighting Spirit is full, consumes all Fighting Spirit to activate Hell Flare. Hell Flare: Attacks all enemies with a dark flame sphere. Penetrates the target's Defense by 30%, and when the caster is granted Multilayer Barrier, penetrates the target's Defense by an additional 30%.

S3.name: Show No Mercy
S3.description: Attacks the enemy by slashing their soul, increasing Combat Readiness of the ally with the highest Combat Readiness except for the caster by 15%. When the caster is granted Multilayer Barrier, acquired Fighting Spirit is doubled.

S1.name: Sequential Cutter
S1.description: Quickly strikes the enemy with a sword, recovering Health proportional to damage dealt. Increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 15% and when the enemy is defeated, increases Combat Readiness of the caster by an additional 35%.

S2.name: Cursed Sword
S2.description: As Health decreases, Attack, Defense, and Speed increase. At the start of the battle, grants immortality to the caster for 1 turn.

S3.name: Blade Art: Dragon
S3.description: Attacks all enemies, sacrificing 20% of the caster's current Health and increases Attack of the caster for 2 turns. Increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 50% when an enemy is defeated. This skill cannot trigger a counterattack.

S1.name: Fallen Flower
S1.description: Throws swords at the enemy, with a 75% chance to decrease Defense for 1 turn. A successful attack deals additional damage proportional to the caster's Attack.

S2.name: Witch's Curse
S2.description: Increases Hit Chance by 50%. Allies and enemies cannot revive. Upon receiving lethal damage, grants immortality for 1 turn. Immortality effect can only be activated once every 5 turns.

S3.name: Cursed Thorn
S3.description: Attacks all enemies with a cursed thornbush, dispelling all buffs, with a 100% chance to make them unable to be buffed for 2 turns. A successful attack deals additional damage proportional to the caster's Attack.

S1.name: Uppercut
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a sheath, and grants stealth to the caster for 1 turn.

S2.name: Intuition
S2.description: At the start of the first battle, grants stealth for 2 turns. After an enemy uses a non-attack skill, dispels all debuffs from the caster and attacks a random enemy with Blink. Can only be activated once every 2 turns. Blink: Cuts the enemy in the blink of an eye and increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 30%. Unaffected by elemental disadvantage.

S3.name: Thunderclap
S3.description: Attacks the enemy repeatedly, and grants increased Evasion and a barrier to the caster for 2 turns. When the enemy is not an Elite or Boss monster, damage sharing effects are ignored. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Attack.

S1.name: Playing with Fire
S1.description: Attacks with a flaming sword, with a 75% chance to make the target unhealable for 1 turn.

S2.name: Hot Streak!
S2.description: Shoots fire, granting the caster Increase Attack (Greater), resetting the cooldown of All-In!, and granting an extra turn.

S3.name: All-In!
S3.description: Attacks with a blazing inferno, penetrating Defense by 50%.

S1.name: Mystical Arrow
S1.description: Summons a mystical bow to attack the enemy, before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 15%. Triggers a Dual Attack from a random ally when Frost Storm is unavailable due to cooldown count.

S2.name: Luminous Explosion
S2.description: Explodes a magical sphere, stunning for 1 turn and making them unable to be buffed for 2 turns. Increases the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%.

S3.name: Frost Storm
S3.description: Attacks all enemies with a raging frost storm, decreasing buff durations by 1 turn, before a 100% chance each to decrease Speed and restrict for 2 turns. Attacks using an advantageous element.

S1.name: Electrocute
S1.description: Attacks with electricity. A critical hit will increase damage dealt.

S2.name: Electric Charge
S2.description: When an ally makes a critical hit, grants stackable increased Attack to the caster according to the number of critical hits made. This effect is dispelled after attacking.

S3.name: Supercharge
S3.description: Releases powerful electricity, increasing Critical Hit Chance of all allies for 3 turns, and Combat Readiness by 20%. The caster is also granted an extra turn.

S1.name: Slash
S1.description: Attacks with a giant sword, with a 60% chance to decrease Attack for 1 turn. After using this skill, has a 25% chance to activate Smash as an extra attack. Chance to activate Smash is doubled when the enemy is buffed.

S2.name: Smash
S2.description: Attacks the enemy repeatedly with a giant sword, with a 100% chance to dispel all buffs. Damage dealt increases proportional to number of buffs granted to the caster.

S3.name: Faithful Strike
S3.description: Attacks all enemies with a swordstorm, increasing Attack and Defense of all allies for 2 turns. When there are three or fewer enemies, damage dealt increases as enemies become fewer.

S1.name: Dual Swords
S1.description: Attacks with dual swords, with a 50% chance to decrease Attack for 1 turn. When the caster is buffed, Dual Swords becomes an attack that targets all enemies when used on the caster's turn. Increases caster's Combat Readiness by 20% after attacking with this changed attack, and a successful attack with this changed attack always results in a critical hit. This changed attack does not trigger a Dual Attack.

S2.name: Will of the Swamp
S2.description: After being attacked, the caster gains 20 Fighting Spirit and is granted increased Attack and Defense for 1 turn. When attacked on the caster's turn, acquired Fighting Spirit is doubled. Increased Attack and Defense can only be granted once per turn.

S3.name: Vortex
S3.description: Cuts all enemies while spinning, making them unhealable for 2 turns. Acquires 100 Fighting Spirit after using this skill.

S1.name: Chop
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a spear before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 20%. A critical hit will double the amount of Focus gained. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S2.name: Fwoooosh!
S2.description: Attacks the enemy by wildly swinging a spear, and absorbs some of the damage dealt as Health. Penetrates the enemy's Defense by 70%. When the caster's stacked Focus is 5, consumes all Focus, increasing damage dealt and resetting the cooldown of Fwoooosh!. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S3.name: Help Me, Cream!
S3.description: Freezes all enemies before attacking with Cream. Increases Critical Hit Resistance of all allies for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health. When this skill is unavailable due to cooldown count, after an ally except for the caster is attacked, has a 20% chance to counterattack.

S1.name: Harsh Lesson
S1.description: Attacks with a morning star, with a 50% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.

S2.name: Rage
S2.description: The caster becomes enraged for 3 turns and activates Kya-hahaha when an enemy is defeated by Harsh Lesson or Hysteric. Kya-hahaha: Attacks all enemies by swinging an iron mace.

S3.name: Hysteric
S3.description: Attacks all enemies by spinning. When an enemy is defeated, resets skill cooldown. When the caster is enraged, damage dealt is increased.

S1.name: Elimination
S1.description: Sharply cuts the enemy to attack. When used on the caster's turn, if the caster is granted perception, uses Demolition instead of Elimination. Demolition: Attacks the enemy with a sword, absorbing some of the damage dealt as Health. Damage dealt increases proportional to the target's lost Health. When the enemy is defeated, decreases cooldown of Descent by 1 turn. This attack does not trigger a Dual Attack.

S2.name: Closer
S2.description: At the start of the first battle, increases Evasion for 1 turn. After an ally except for the caster attacks, when the enemy's Health is less than 40%, increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 50% and grants perception for 2 turns. Can only be activated once every 2 turns.

S3.name: Descent
S3.description: Attacks all enemies after descending, increasing Attack of all allies for 2 turns before increasing Combat Readiness by 20%. This skill cannot trigger a counterattack.

S1.name: Shield Slam
S1.description: Attacks the enemy by shoving them with a shield, with a 75% chance to transfer one debuff from the caster to the enemy. When the caster is granted indomitable, damage dealt is increased and the enemy is stunned for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

S2.name: Macerate
S2.description: Attacks all enemies with an iron mace, decreasing Combat Readiness by 30%. When the enemy's Combat Readiness reaches 0, stuns for 1 turn. When the caster is granted indomitable, doubles the amount of Combat Readiness decrease. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

S3.name: Fury's Advent
S3.description: By discharging Fighting Spirit, grants indomitable to the caster for 3 turns and an extra turn. Begins the first battle with 50 Fighting Spirit. Gains 10 Fighting Spirit when attacked.

S1.name: Takedown
S1.description: Attacks with a large shield, with a 100% chance to provoke for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

S2.name: Security State
S2.description: Decreases damage received by allies by 15%. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.

S3.name: Shield of Holy Spirit
S3.description: Covers all allies with an aura of holy spirit, granting immunity for 2 turns and invincibility for 1 turn.

S1.name: Shield Bash
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a shield, with a 100% chance to provoke for 1 turn, before recovering the caster's Health. Damage dealt and amount recovered increase proportional to the caster's max Health.

S2.name: Ruin's Advent
S2.description: Immune to stun. At the moment the caster is attacked, the caster has a 100% chance of their skill cooldown being decreased by 1 turn, or 2 turns in the case of a critical hit.

S3.name: Devil's Descent
S3.description: Attacks the enemy with a lethal hit. When the enemy is defeated, inflicts extinction. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health and penetrates the target's Defense. This attack cannot trigger a critical hit. Begins the battle with a full skill cooldown count.

S1.name: Key to an Oath
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a staff and heals the ally with the lowest Health. Healing increases proportional to the target's max Health.

S2.name: Regen
S2.description: Blesses an ally, dispelling two debuffs and recovering Health before increasing Combat Readiness by 30%. Healing increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S3.name: Destina's Grace
S3.description: Grants all allies the blessing of a Spirit Lord, dispelling all debuffs before recovering Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health. At the start of the first battle, grants Spirit's Blessing to the caster for 2 turns.

S1.name: Light of Judgment
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a ray of brilliant light, increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 15%. Effect doubles when caster is buffed.

S2.name: Blessings of the Goddess
S2.description: With the Blessings of the Goddess, dispels two debuffs from all allies and grants barrier for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the target's max Health.

S3.name: Saint's Prayer
S3.description: A miracle of the Goddess manifests, increasing Attack of all allies for 3 turns, before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%.

S1.name: I Used This to Catch Fish
S1.description: Attacks all enemies with the power of magic, with a 25% chance each to stun for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases on debuffed enemies.

S2.name: Gamma Ray
S2.description: Attacks all enemies with a powerful ray, extending the duration of debuffs by 1 turn, except for those which prevent the enemy from moving.

S3.name: Emotional Gamma Ray
S3.description: Unleashes a giant explosion to attack all enemies. The attack misses, but inflicts decreased Speed, Attack, and Hit Chance for 2 turns regardless.

S1.name: Barrage
S1.description: Fires a barrage of bullets at the enemy, with a 75% chance to make them unable to be buffed for 1 turn.

S2.name: Judge Better Half
S2.description: Traps the enemy in a cake, before attacking them with a cake-cutting blade and increasing Attack of all allies for 2 turns. When the enemy is asleep, decreases Defense of all enemies for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the number of debuffs inflicted on the enemy.

S3.name: Magnum Wedding
S3.description: Dispels two buffs from the enemy before shooting a bullet of love, with a 100% chance to put them to sleep for 2 turns. Grants the caster an extra turn.

S1.name: Huma
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with ice, before recovering Health of the ally with the lowest Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S2.name: Spirit's Blessing
S2.description: Grants a blessing to an ally except for the caster, dispelling two debuffs and increasing Combat Readiness by 50%. Increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 25%.

S3.name: Divine Protection of the Great Spirit
S3.description: Uses spiritual arts to dispel two debuffs from all allies, before recovering Health and granting a barrier for 2 turns. Amount recovered and barrier strength increase proportional to the caster's max Health.

S1.name: Icy Impact
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with shards of ice, with a 75% chance to decrease Defense for 1 turn.

S2.name: Cold Snap
S2.description: Attacks all enemies with an explosion of ice, dispelling two buffs before decreasing Combat Readiness by a random amount between 15% and 40%. Grants the caster skill nullifier once.

S3.name: Absolute Zero
S3.description: Releases energy to attack all enemies, with an 85% chance to stun for 1 turn. When an ally uses a non-attack skill and this skill is available according to cooldown count, increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 20%.

S1.name: Starlight's Will
S1.description: Attacks with the power of the stars, dispelling one debuff each from two allies.

S2.name: Guardian's Authority
S2.description: When an ally suffers an attack that targets all enemies, decreases the damage received by 20% and activates Consecrated Ground. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied. Consecrated Ground can be activated once every 2 turns. Consecrated Ground: Recovers the Health of all allies before increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 20%. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S3.name: Eternally Shining Comet
S3.description: Attacks all enemies with a meteor shower, and dispels one debuff from all allies before granting invincibility to all allies for 1 turn.

S1.name: Heavy Strike
S1.description: Attacks the enemy, with a 75% chance to decrease Attack for 1 turn.

S2.name: Meteor Shower
S2.description: Attacks all enemies with Meteor Shower of Light and recovers the Health of all allies. Healing increases proportional to the ally's max Health.

S3.name: Light's Protection
S3.description: Recovers Health and increases Attack and Defense of all allies for 2 turns with strengthening magic. Amount recovered is proportional to the target's max Health.

S1.name: Vengeance
S1.description: Rapidly attacks the enemy, with a 50% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.

S2.name: Sword of Hatred
S2.description: Attacks the enemy repeatedly. When the enemy's max Health is greater than the caster's max Health, Combat Readiness of the caster increases proportional to the difference, up to a maximum of 30%.

S3.name: Heir to the Throne
S3.description: Attacks the enemy with a sword, adopting a counterattacking stance and granting a barrier to the caster for 2 turns. When the enemy is defeated, extends buff durations of the caster by 1 turn and grants an extra turn. When the enemy's max Health is greater than the caster's max Health, damage dealt increases proportional to the difference, up to a maximum of 70%. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Attack.

S1.name: One Pair
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a mystical power, with a 75% chance each to inflict redirected provoke for 1 turn.

S2.name: Wild Card
S2.description: When an ally is attacked by an enemy inflicted with provoke or redirected provoke, activates Shuffle. Shuffle can only be activated once per turn. Shuffle: Attacks all enemies and inflicts a random debuff for 1 turn. A successful attack against a target inflicted with provoke or redirected provoke inflicts additional damage. Additional damage increases proportional to the target's max Health.

S3.name: Tea Party
S3.description: Lures all enemies in with a tea party and attacks, making them unable to be buffed for 2 turns and inflicting redirected provoke for 1 turn.

S1.name: Mistake
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a spear of revenge and has a 100% chance to provoke for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S2.name: Strong Instinct
S2.description: Decreases additional damage and fixed damage received by allies from Heroes by 50%. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied. At the end of the turn, grants a barrier to the ally with the lowest Health for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S3.name: Spear of Resentment
S3.description: Attacks all enemies in an explosion of spiteful emotions and dispels all buffs before transferring all debuffs inflicted on the caster. Grants skill nullifier once to all allies. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S1.name: Communication Breakdown
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a gun, with a 75% chance to dispel one buff.

S2.name: Data Monopoly
S2.description: Encourages an ally, increasing Attack and Critical Hit Damage for 2 turns before increasing Combat Readiness by 40%.

S3.name: Advantageous Deal
S3.description: Drives a hard bargain against all enemies, decreasing Defense for 2 turns before decreasing Combat Readiness by 15%. Grants an extra turn.

S1.name: Half Slash
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with an axe, with a 50% chance to decrease Attack for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the target's max Health.

S2.name: Energy Wave
S2.description: Attacks all enemies with condensed energy, and absorbs some of the damage dealt as Health.

S3.name: Pursuit Cut
S3.description: Dashes towards the enemy to attack, and decreases Defense for 2 turns. A critical hit will grant immunity to the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the target's max Health.

S1.name: Quickdraw
S1.description: Fires a gun while dashing towards the enemy, with a 35% chance to burn for 2 turns.

S2.name: Morale Boost
S2.description: Raises morale of all allies, granting increased Critical Hit Chance for 2 turns.

S3.name: Fatal Bullet
S3.description: Attacks with a fatal shot, with a 100% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.

S1.name: Heroic Strike
S1.description: Mows down the enemy with a great sword, with a 75% chance to provoke for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S2.name: Spearhead
S2.description: After being attacked, increases Combat Readiness of all allies by 15%.

S3.name: Command to Charge
S3.description: Gives the command to charge, dealing damage to all enemies, with a 100% chance each to stun two random enemies for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S1.name: Whispering Spirit
S1.description: Attacks with spirit power, with a 50% chance to decrease Speed for 2 turns.

S2.name: Spirit's Protection
S2.description: Attacks with spirit power, before recovering Health of all allies and granting a barrier for 2 turns. Amount recovered and barrier strength increase proportional to the caster's Attack.

S3.name: Wave of Force
S3.description: Delivers a blow to the enemy with spirit power and dispels all buffs, before increasing Attack of the ally with the highest Attack for 2 turns.

S1.name: Supersonic Kick
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a kick. A successful attack inflicts additional damage proportional to the caster's Attack.

S2.name: Prairie Hawk
S2.description: When attacking, cannot trigger a critical hit. Damage suffered from a critical hit decreases by 30%. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied. At the start of the turn, when the caster does not have a debuff, increases Attack for 1 turn.

S3.name: Monarch's Flaming Strike
S3.description: Attacks the enemy with a secret technique and grants immunity and a barrier to the caster for 2 turns. When the caster's Attack is greater than the target's Attack, penetrates the target's Defense, with penetration rate increasing proportional to the difference, up to a maximum of 100%. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Attack.

S1.name: Rush
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a spear. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health. When this skill is used, if it was not triggered by a Dual Attack, has a 50% chance to use Punish instead of Rush. This skill does not trigger a Dual Attack.

S2.name: Punish
S2.description: Attacks and pierces the enemy, inflicting injuries. A successful attack deals additional damage equivalent to 50% of injuries inflicted on the target. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health. The severity of injuries increases proportional to the damage dealt. Injuries decrease max Health of the target by up to 20% every time this skill is used.

S3.name: Repel
S3.description: Attacks all enemies mercilessly, inflicting injuries. Increases Critical Hit Damage of all allies for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health. The severity of injuries increases proportional to damage dealt. Injuries decrease max Health of the target by up to 20% every time this skill is used.

S1.name: Refined Flower
S1.description: Throws swords at the enemy, with a 50% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.

S2.name: Oathkeeper
S2.description: Resets skill cooldown of an ally except for the caster with light energy.

S3.name: Full Bloom
S3.description: Attacks the enemy with a giant Magic Sword, dispelling all buffs, before decreasing Defense and making them unable to be buffed for 2 turns.

S1.name: Sever
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a scythe. Penetrates the target's Defense by 20%.

S2.name: End of Evil
S2.description: Attacks all enemies with a scythe, dispelling all buffs before applying a 175% chance to decrease Hit Chance for 2 turns and a 175% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns, and increase Combat Readiness of the caster by 25% per target. This skill cannot trigger a counterattack.

S3.name: Wave of Light
S3.description: Attacks all enemies by distorting space and time before increasing skill cooldowns by 1 turn.

S1.name: Sequential Cutter
S1.description: Strikes the enemy with a sword. A critical hit will decrease skill cooldown by 1 turn.

S2.name: Blade Art: Flash
S2.description: Slashes the enemy. A critical hit will decrease Defense for 1 turn.

S3.name: Blade Art: Thunder
S3.description: Cuts the enemy with lightning speed. Damage dealt increases with a critical hit.

S1.name: Void Slash
S1.description: Attacks with a sword, with a 50% chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn, dealing damage proportional to the caster's lost Health. When this skill is used, if it was not triggered by a Dual Attack and the caster has a buff, this skill changes into an attack that targets all enemies. The changed attack does not trigger a Dual Attack.

S2.name: Immortal Will
S2.description: When the caster receives lethal damage, grants immortality for 1 turn and increased Evasion for 2 turns and resets skill cooldown of Apocalypse. Can only be activated once every 6 turns.

S3.name: Apocalypse
S3.description: Attacks the enemy by exploding the Archdemon's Might contained within the sword, before absorbing some of the damage dealt as Health. When the enemy is defeated, extends buff durations granted to the caster by 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's lost Health.

S1.name: Knockout
S1.description: Attacks with a flurry of strikes, with a 50% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. Burns the enemy for 2 turns when the caster is granted vigor. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S2.name: Celestial Kick
S2.description: Kicks the enemy with a series of kicks, decreasing Defense for 2 turns before granting the caster increased Speed for 2 turns. When the caster is granted vigor, ignores Effect Resistance. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S3.name: Phoenix Flurry
S3.description: Attacks with a flurry of strikes before delivering a powerful blow, stunning for 1 turn. Grants vigor to the caster for 3 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health. At the start of the first battle, gains 40 Fighting Spirit.

S1.name: Swordstorm
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a swordstorm, with a 75% chance to provoke for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S2.name: Charge
S2.description: Shoves the enemy with a shield, decreasing Combat Readiness by 50%, before granting increased Defense to all allies for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S3.name: Summon Ziegfried
S3.description: Summons the Guardian Ziegfried to attack, dealing damage proportional to the caster's lost Health, penetrating Defense. This attack cannot trigger a critical hit.

S1.name: Fire
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with gunfire, and increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 15%. When the target has a buff, doubles the effects of Combat Readiness increase and Fighting Spirit gained.

S2.name: The Chief Is on the Scene
S2.description: At the start of the first battle, gains 50 Fighting Spirit and grants stealth for 1 turn. At the start of the turn, gains 10 Fighting Spirit for each buff granted to an enemy, and when Fighting Spirit is full, resets skill cooldown. After attacking, increases Attack of the caster by 25%. This effect can stack up to 3 times.

S3.name: Full Burst
S3.description: Fires at all enemies and grants all allies increased Speed for 2 turns, before increasing their Combat Readiness by 15%. When Fighting Spirit is full, consumes all Fighting Spirit to penetrate the target's Defense by 50%. This attack cannot trigger a counterattack.

S1.name: Punishment
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a swordstorm, before increasing Speed of the caster for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S2.name: Code Number 00
S2.description: After being attacked, decreases skill cooldowns by 1 turn. After suffering an attack that targets all allies, decreases skill cooldowns by an additional 1 turn, and grants a barrier to all allies for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health. Barrier effect can only be activated once per turn.

S3.name: Mobile Weapon Ziegfried
S3.description: Summons Ziegfried to attack all enemies and decreases skill cooldowns of all allies by 1 turn. Penetrates Defense, and cannot trigger a critical hit. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health and Speed. Damage dealt increases every time this skill is used and can stack up to 3 times.

S1.name: Wild Rose
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a sword and has a 80% chance each to inflict two bleeding effects for 1 turn. At the end of the turn, detonates bleeding effects inflicted on the target.

S2.name: Thornbush
S2.description: Inflicts resource reduction on all enemies by 60% before attacking, decreasing buff durations by 1 turn and inflicting bind for 2 turns. For every target, increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 25%.

S3.name: Public Execution
S3.description: Attacks the enemy with a whip sword, inflicting decreased Defense for 2 turns before decreasing Combat Readiness by 100%. Grants skill nullifier once to all allies. When the target is inflicted with bind, ignores Effect Resistance.

S1.name: Follow Me! Charge!
S1.description: Takes the lead to attack the enemy, and triggers a Dual Attack from a random ally. Increases Critical Hit Chance by 50% when attacking and damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S2.name: That's Far Enough!
S2.description: After an enemy uses a non-attack skill, dispels one debuff from the caster, and activates Suppression against the enemy caster. Suppression can only be activated once every 2 turns. Suppression: Provokes the target for 1 turn, and grants a barrier to the caster for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S3.name: Ready, Load, Fire!
S3.description: Commands the Perland Army to attack by firing on all enemies, decreasing Combat Readiness by 25%. Increases Critical Hit Chance by 50% when attacking, inflicting damage according to the Attack of the Hero with the highest Attack.

S1.name: Slice-Slice
S1.description: Strikes and slices the enemy, with a 50% chance to make them unable to be buffed for 2 turns.

S2.name: Snip-Snip
S2.description: Brutally cuts the enemy, with a 55% chance each to inflict three bleeding effects for 2 turns, before increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 50%.

S3.name: Soul Cutter
S3.description: Slashes the enemy with Cho & Mal, before granting the caster skill nullifier once. When the enemy is defeated, inflicts extinction and decreases the caster's skill cooldown by 1 turn. Hit Chance is increased by 20% when using this skill.

S1.name: Judgment
S1.description: Attacks with a giant sword before granting the caster immunity for 1 turn.

S2.name: A Queen's Dignity
S2.description: Decreases damage suffered from a critical hit by 30%. Decreases damage suffered from a critical hit for all allies except for the caster by 15%. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied. At the moment the caster suffers a critical hit, increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 15%.

S3.name: The Will of La Mare
S3.description: Smashes the enemy with a sword and attacks. When the enemy is defeated, inflicts extinction. Penetrates the target's Defense by 50%. When the target is a Dark elemental Hero, increases damage dealt and inflicts additional damage proportional to the caster's Attack to all enemies except for the target.

S1.name: Wild Wave
S1.description: Attacks with intense elemental force, with a 50% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health.

S2.name: Rekos's Blessing
S2.description: With the blessing of the stars, grants increased Defense and barrier to all allies for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Attack.

S3.name: Wave of Vengeance
S3.description: Attacks all enemies with the power of ruin, with a 100% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.

S1.name: Infinity Slash
S1.description: Stabs the target a random number of times. Skill cooldown decreases by 1-3 turns and damage dealt increases according to the number of attacks.

S2.name: Dragon Knight's Will
S2.description: Increases Critical Hit Chance and Critical Hit Resistance by 90%. Increases Attack by 90% when the caster's Health is 50% or more, and increases Defense by 90% when the caster's Health is less than 50%.

S3.name: Ragnar Spear
S3.description: Soars into the air and hits the enemy with a spear, with a 100% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. Penetrates the target's Defense by 50%. Acquires 5 additional Souls when the enemy is defeated.

S1.name: Knockout
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a flurry of strikes, with a 100% chance to inflict provoke for 1 turn. A successful attack always results in a critical hit.

S2.name: Dragon Flame
S2.description: At the start of battle, grants vigor for 3 turns. When an ally except for the caster suffers a critical hit, counterattacks, and when the caster suffers a critical hit, counterattacks with Dragon Flame. Dragon Flame (Acquire 1 Soul): Attacks the enemy with a kick and penetrates the target's Defense by 50%. A successful attack always results in a critical hit, dealing damage proportional to the caster's lost Health.

S3.name: The Coming of Asura
S3.description: Attacks all enemies with a powerful ground pound, with a 80% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. A successful attack always results in a critical hit.

S1.name: Might
S1.description: Overpowers the enemy, with a 75% chance to make them unhealable for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's lost Health.

S2.name: Manifestation
S2.description: Attacks by unleashing their inner rage, before granting immortality and immunity to the caster for 1 turn. This skill's cooldown is reset when the enemy is defeated. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's lost Health.

S3.name: Blood Bloom
S3.description: Dispels all buffs from the enemy before attacking by releasing their pent-up aggression, cursing for 2 turns regardless of whether the attack hits. This skill is unaffected by elemental disadvantage. Elite or Boss monsters cannot be cursed.

S1.name: Dragon Dive
S1.description: Attacks the enemy, recovering Health proportional to damage dealt before increasing Attack of the caster for 1 turn.

S2.name: Dragon Eye (Milim Eye)
S2.description: At the start of battle and at the end of the turn, has a 100% chance to grant Dragon Eye (Milim Eye) to the caster for 1 turn. When the caster is granted Dragon Eye (Milim Eye) at the start of the turn, dispels stealth from all enemies. Ignores Effect Resistance. When Focus is full after attacking, consumes all Focus to activate Dragon Buster. Dragon Buster: Attacks all enemies with overwhelming mana, removing 10 Souls.

S3.name: Dragon Fear
S3.description: Releases mana to attack the enemy, inflicting extinction when the enemy is defeated. Increases Evasion of the caster for 3 turns.

S1.name: Heavy Strike
S1.description: Attacks with a hammer, with a 40% chance to stun for 1 turn. When the target is stunned after the attack, increases Combat Readiness of all allies except for the caster by 15%.

S2.name: Maid's Cheer
S2.description: Increases Effect Resistance of all allies by 20%. At the start of the turn, recovers Health of the two allies with the lowest Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S3.name: VIP Treatment
S3.description: Entertains all allies with VIP Treatment, reviving all dead allies to 20% Health. Dispels two debuffs from all living allies and grants revive for 3 turns.

S1.name: Extermination
S1.description: Attacks the enemy by piercing them, with a 50% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. Ignores Effect Resistance of any targets with Max Health lower than the caster's Max Health.

S2.name: Absolute Dignity
S2.description: Immune to debuffs which prevent movement. All Heroes except for the caster cannot counterattack. When an ally is attacked, has a 20% chance to counterattack and when counterattacking, activates Sacred Blessing. Sacred Blessing can be activated once every 3 turns. Sacred Blessing: Grants a barrier to all allies for 2 turns, and increases Speed of the caster for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S3.name: Advent: Mortelix
S3.description: Descends and attacks all enemies, inflicting fear for 2 turns, before recovering Health of the caster. Penetrates Defense of the enemy with the highest Max Health by 70%, and ignores Effect Resistance of any targets with Max Health lower than the caster's Max Health. Damage dealt and amount recovered increase proportional to the caster's max Health.

S1.name: Hurricane Sword
S1.description: Strikes the enemy with a gun, with a 75% chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

S2.name: Storm Bullet
S2.description: Fires a strong blast of wind at all enemies. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed. This skill cannot trigger a counterattack.

S3.name: Destructive Pursuit
S3.description: Swiftly cuts and shoots the enemy. When the enemy is not an Elite or Boss monster, damage sharing effects are ignored. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

S1.name: Wolven Claw
S1.description: Slashes the enemy with sharp claws, with a 40% chance to stun for 1 turn. When the caster is granted a barrier, effect chance increases by 25%.

S2.name: Punishing Blade
S2.description: Attacks all enemies with guardian spirits, decreasing buff duration by 1 turn, before restricting and making them unable to be buffed for 2 turns.

S3.name: Pack Hunt
S3.description: Using the power of the Goblet of Oath, increases Attack of all allies except for the caster for 2 turns, before granting stealth, escort, and a barrier to the caster for 3 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's level.

S1.name: Call of the Stars
S1.description: Summons dolls to attack the enemy, with a 40% chance to stun for 1 turn.

S2.name: Astral Guide
S2.description: When the enemy is not an Elite or Boss monster, reduces the effect of Combat Readiness increases granted to the enemy by 50%. This effect does not stack with other passive effects of the same name. Activates Tranquility when an enemy uses a non-attack skill. Tranquility can only be activated once every 2 turns. Tranquility: Attacks all enemies, decreasing buff durations by 1 turn, before increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 30%.

S3.name: Starfall
S3.description: Attacks all enemies with alien technology, with a 100% chance to make them unable to be buffed for 2 turns.

S1.name: Tempest
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a swordstorm. Penetrates the target's Defense by 20%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

S2.name: Mental Focus
S2.description: Grants immunity to all allies for 2 turns before increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns. Grants an extra turn to the caster.

S3.name: Instant Blade
S3.description: Attacks all enemies with a sword, dispelling two buffs before a 85% chance to inflict stigma for 2 turns, and a 85% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster and the target's Speed.

S1.name: Leave it to Me.
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a morning star, with a 50% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. When the caster is granted Demon Mode, grants the caster an extra attack with the same skill.

S2.name: A Maid's Pride
S2.description: When somebody dies, dispels all debuffs from the caster and grants Demon Mode for 2 turns. Can only be activated once every 5 turns. When an ally except for the caster is attacked, has a 20% chance to counterattack with Iron Strike. Iron Strike takes priority over a counterattack with a basic skill. Iron Strike: Attacks all enemies, decreasing buff durations by 1 turn and making them unhealable for 1 turn.

S3.name: I Will Punish You!
S3.description: Increases Attack of the caster for 3 turns, before leaping up to attack all enemies and decrease Hit Chance for 2 turns.

S1.name: Okay, Shall I Get Started?
S1.description: Cuts the enemy to attack, granting a random buff to the caster for 1 turn.

S2.name: Analyze and Assess
S2.description: After attacking with a non-basic skill, copies two buffs when the target is buffed, regardless of whether the attack hits and grants their effects to all allies. This effect is not applied to undispellable buffs. When an ally is attacked by a buffed enemy, activates Be Ready! against the attacker. Be Ready! can only be activated once every 3 turns. Be Ready!: Quickly approaches the enemy and attacks, increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 30%.

S3.name: Devour It, Black Flame!
S3.description: Attacks the enemy with black flame, and a successful attack will inflict 5,000 additional fixed damage to the target. Fixed damage increases proportional to the number of buffs granted to all allies, up to a maximum of 10,000 fixed damage. Unaffected by elemental disadvantage.

S1.name: Soul Purification
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a noble power, granting a barrier to the ally with the lowest Health for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health. Grants a barrier to all allies for 2 turns after attacking.

S2.name: Vigilant Eye
S2.description: Recovers Health of all allies when an ally is attacked by an extra attack, counterattack, or Dual Attack, and increases Combat Readiness of all allies by 5% each per attacked ally. Amount recovered is proportional to the caster's max Health and the number of attacked allies.

S3.name: Noble Rekos
S3.description: With the grace of Rekos, grants a barrier and revive to all allies for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S1.name: Sword Flash
S1.description: Cuts the enemy, with a 75% chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn. Grants an extra turn.

S2.name: Concentration
S2.description: Increases Evasion by 50%, and after successfully evading, gains 1 Focus. When Focus is at 5 after attacking or being attacked, consumes it all and uses Massacre against a random enemy.

S3.name: Massacre
S3.description: Attacks the enemy with a sword. Penetrates the target's Defense by 50%.

S1.name: Spear of Vengeance
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a spear, with a 75% chance to provoke for 1 turn. When it is not the caster's turn, effect chance increases by 25%.

S2.name: Indomitable Spirit
S2.description: Attack increases by 30% and Critical Hit Resistance increases by 50%. When attacking, cannot trigger a critical hit. When attacked, if the caster suffers a non-critical hit, deals damage to the attacker proportional to the caster's Attack before activating Grace of the Battlefield. Grace of the Battlefield can only be activated once every 2 turns. Grace of the Battlefield: Grants a barrier to all allies for 2 turns, and increases Speed of the caster for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Attack.

S3.name: Dragon Slayer's Strike
S3.description: Attacks all enemies by striking downwards with a spear and has a 100% chance to decrease Hit Chance for 2 turns and a 100% chance to provoke for 1 turn. Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

S1.name: Watch Out
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a fan, with a 75% chance to target the enemy for 1 turn.

S2.name: I'm with My Friends
S2.description: For every surviving ally, decreases damage suffered by 10%. When more than one damage reduction effect of the same kind is granted, only the strongest effect is applied. When an ally is attacked, gains 1 Focus, and when the caster's stacked Focus is 5, consumes all Focus and activates You're Not Cute. You're Not Cute: Attacks all enemies with a fan, with a 75% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.

S3.name: Haven't I Warned You?
S3.description: Attacks all enemies with a spray of water, dispelling all buffs before a 100% chance each to inflict cannot buff and unhealable for 2 turns. Ignores Effect Resistance.

S1.name: Sever
S1.description: Attacks with a scythe, with a 50% chance each of inflicting two bleeding effects for 2 turns.

S2.name: Smash
S2.description: Batters the enemy with a scythe, with a 100% chance each to make them unhealable and inflict bleeding for 2 turns. When the enemy's Health is 50% or less after the attack, activates Sever as an extra attack with a 100% chance of inflicting bleeding. Grants an extra turn.

S3.name: Guillotine
S3.description: Inflicts lethal damage to the enemy, piercing their weak point. Penetrates Defense by 30%, with an additional 5% for each debuff inflicted on the enemy. Inflicts extinction when the enemy is defeated.

S1.name: Powerful Strike
S1.description: Swings a sword to attack the enemy and increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 20%.

S2.name: Destructive Gaze
S2.description: Attacks all enemies with a wave of force and dispels two buffs. Ignores Effect Resistance of any targets with Attack lower than the caster's Attack. When there are three or fewer enemies, damage dealt increases with fewer enemies.

S3.name: Star Extinction
S3.description: Attacks all enemies with a sword. Penetrates Defense of the target with the highest max Health by 30%. When the caster's Attack is greater than the penetration target's Attack, penetration rate increases proportional to the difference, up to a maximum of 100%. This skill cannot trigger a counterattack.

S1.name: Serene Tune
S1.description: (Tamarinne) Attacks an enemy with a serene melody and heals the ally with the lowest Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the ally's max Health. Decreases cooldown of Shining Star by 1 turn. (Idol) Attacks all enemies with a beautiful voice, dispelling all buffs. Triggers a Dual Attack from the ally with the highest Attack.

S2.name: Song of the Forest
S2.description: (Tamarinne) Heals all allies with a peaceful melody. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health. Decreases cooldown of Shining Star by 1 turn. (Idol) With a powerful performance, increases Attack of all allies for 2 turns and increases Combat Readiness by 50%, recovering Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S3.name: Shining Star
S3.description: Before performing, dispels all debuffs inflicted on all allies and recovers the caster to max Health. The caster becomes an idol for 3 turns and performs a concert. Begins the first battle with full cooldown count.

S1.name: Dark Explosion
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with an explosion of dark energy, with a 70% chance to put them to sleep for 1 turn. This skill does not trigger a Dual Attack.

S2.name: Ominous Thunder
S2.description: Summons ominous thunder to attack all enemies, decreasing Combat Readiness by 30% and inflicting decreased Speed and restrict for 2 turns.

S3.name: Nightmare
S3.description: Drops Moon of Nightmare on all enemies, with a 85% chance each to decrease Defense for 2 turns and put them to sleep for 1 turn, before increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns.

S1.name: Energy Blast
S1.description: Uses the suit's energy to attack the enemy. When used on the caster's turn, has a 40% chance to grant an extra attack with the same skill. When the enemy is not an Elite or Boss monster, damage sharing effects are ignored.

S2.name: Victory Pose
S2.description: Manifests the suit's energy, granting a barrier to the caster for 3 turns. Grants the caster an extra turn. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's level.

S3.name: Demolish
S3.description: Increases Attack of the caster for 3 turns, before attacking the enemy with dimensional energy and when the enemy is defeated, inflicts extinction. Increases Combat Readiness of all allies by 20%, and grants stealth to the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

S1.name: Sweep
S1.description: Rapidly attacks two enemies with a swordstorm. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

S2.name: Dancing Blade
S2.description: Increases Attack of the caster for 2 turns and activates Dancing Blade when an enemy is defeated by Sweep or Blade Ascent. Dancing Blade (Acquire 1 Soul): Attacks all enemies with a swordstorm.

S3.name: Blade Ascent
S3.description: Attacks all enemies with a swordstorm, dealing damage proportional to the caster's Speed.

S1.name: Graceful Cut
S1.description: Attacks with a sword, with a 75% chance to decrease Attack for 1 turn. When it is not the caster's turn, increases Combat Readiness by 15% and gains double the amount of Focus.

S2.name: Duel Accepted
S2.description: Prepares for a duel by dispelling two debuffs from the caster and granting perception for 3 turns before recovering Health by 15%. Grants an extra turn to the caster.

S3.name: Butterfly Cut
S3.description: Pierces the enemy with a sword, and consumes all Focus. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of Focus consumed. When Butterfly Cut is available according to cooldown count, increases Evasion by 35%, and after successfully evading, counterattacks with Graceful Cut.

S1.name: Vitality Drain
S1.description: Smashes the enemy with a rock, increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 15%.

S2.name: Thunder God's Cry
S2.description: Attacks all enemies with a thunderstorm. Activates Thunder God's Cry again when an enemy is defeated. Each subsequent Thunder God's Cry activated this way deals decreased damage, and can be activated up to 3 times.

S3.name: Mana Amplification
S3.description: Fully amplifies mana, granting immunity to all allies for 3 turns before granting increased Attack (Greater) to the caster for 3 turns while increasing Attack of all allies except for the caster for 3 turns.

S1.name: Sniper
S1.description: Shoots the enemy with a rifle, with a 50% chance to target them for 2 turns.

S2.name: Quickfire
S2.description: Shoots all enemies with a rifle, with a 100% chance to dispel one buff, and increases Speed of the caster for 2 turns.

S3.name: Finishing Shot
S3.description: Attack the enemy with a mana bullet. Penetrates the target's Defense.

S1.name: Double Slash
S1.description: Attacks by swinging their weapon, with a 50% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.

S2.name: Dragon's Roar
S2.description: Attacks all enemies with a dragon howl, dispelling one buff, before a 155% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns and a 155% chance to silence for 1 turn. Ignores Effect Resistance.

S3.name: Dragon Charge
S3.description: After granting increased Attack to the caster for 2 turns, attacks the enemy with a massive blade. When the enemy is defeated, grants an extra turn. When this skill is available according to cooldown count, after an ally except for the caster uses a skill, if an enemy has a debuff, increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 20%.

S1.name: Vulnerability Exposed
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a longsword. Increases Critical Hit Chance by 50% when attacking. Damage dealt increases when the target is buffed.

S2.name: Elaborate Plan
S2.description: Dispels two debuffs from an ally and the caster, before increasing Combat Readiness of the ally by 15%. Grants an extra turn to the caster.

S3.name: Execute
S3.description: Attacks the enemy, inflicting injuries before granting the caster invincibility for 1 turn. Increases Critical Hit Chance by 50% when attacking. The severity of injuries increases proportional to damage dealt. Injuries decrease max Health of the target by up to 35% every time this skill is used.

S1.name: Sword Storm
S1.description: Attacks with a swordstorm, with a 75% chance to dispel one buff. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S2.name: Tactical Command
S2.description: Immune to debuffs which prevent movement. When the ally in the back row has a debuff which prevents movement after being attacked, activates Commanding Shout on the target. Can be activated once every 2 turns. Commanding Shout: Dispels all debuffs from the ally and grants immunity for 2 turns.

S3.name: All-Out Attack
S3.description: Attacks all enemies again after a swordstorm, with a 100% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns, and increases Defense of all allies for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S1.name: Homing Laser
S1.description: Attacks all enemies with a drone, before increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 15%, and increasing Combat Readiness of all allies except for the caster by 5%.

S2.name: Upgrade
S2.description: Buffs all allies with a drone and increases Attack for 3 turns. Grants an extra turn to the caster.

S3.name: Meteor Cannon
S3.description: Attacks all enemies with a cannon. When there are three or fewer enemies, damage dealt increases with fewer enemies.

S1.name: Black Thorn
S1.description: Attacks with thorns, with a 35% chance to stun for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S2.name: Star's Armor
S2.description: When the enemy uses a non-attack skill, increases Defense of the caster and damage dealt by Ancient Beast by 10%, and increases Effectiveness by 5%. Can stack up to 8 times.

S3.name: Ancient Beast
S3.description: Summons an ancient beast to attack all enemies, with a 80% chance to silence for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S1.name: Gunflame
S1.description: Attacks an enemy with pillars of fire. Damage dealt increases when the enemy isn't buffed. Activates Roman Cancel when the caster's Fighting Spirit is 100 after attacking. Cannot be triggered by a counterattack. Roman Cancel: Consumes all Fighting Spirit and extends the duration of buffs granted to the caster by 1 turn, before granting the caster an extra turn.

S2.name: Volcanic Viper
S2.description: When an enemy uses a non-attack skill, increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 20% and gains 20 Fighting Spirit. When suffering an attack that targets all allies, activates Volcanic Viper against the attacker. Each effect can only be activated once every 2 turns. Volcanic Viper: Launches the enemy into the air and attacks repeatedly, inflicting silence for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the enemy's max Health.

S3.name: Tyrant Rave ver. Beta
S3.description: Attacks with a strong punch, dispelling all buffs. Damage dealt increases proportional to the enemy's max Health. After attacking, inflicts additional damage regardless of whether the attack hits.

S1.name: Dark Shadow
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with dark energy, with a 50% chance to make the enemy unhealable for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health.

S2.name: Die Hard
S2.description: When attacked, damage suffered in one attack does not exceed 51% of max Health. After an ally except for the caster attacks, when the target's Health is 30% or less, activates Encroach. Encroach can only be activated once every 3 turns. Encroach: Releases dark energy to attack all enemies, and increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 30%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the target's lost Health.

S3.name: Conviction
S3.description: Inflicts lethal damage to the enemy. When the enemy is defeated, inflicts extinction, and deals additional damage proportional to the caster's Attack to all enemies except for the target. Damage dealt increases proportional to the target's lost Health.

S1.name: Full Moon Scythe
S1.description: Attacks with a scythe. Damage dealt increases by 70% when the target has buffs.

S2.name: Dark Scar
S2.description: Attacks all enemies with a scythe. Penetrates the enemy's Defense by 30% and an additional 30% when the caster is stealthed.

S3.name: Nocturne
S3.description: Leaps towards the enemy to attack. Grants stealth and a barrier to the caster for 2 turns, before increasing Combat Readiness by 50%. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Attack. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's current Health ratio.

S1.name: Mighty Strike
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a sheath. If not triggered by a Dual Attack and the caster has a buff, uses Nimble Sword instead. Nimble Sword: After granting increased Attack to the caster for 1 turn, attacks rapidly and absorbs part of the damage as Health. Penetrates Defense by 50%.

S2.name: Sixth Sense
S2.description: Damage suffered in one attack does not exceed 51% of max Health. Decreases skill cooldown by 1 turn when someone dies and acquires 5 Souls. This effect can only be activated once per turn.

S3.name: Spirit Gate: Burning Possession
S3.description: Opens the spirit gate to revive all dead allies. Grants immortality to all allies for 1 turn and grants Possession to the caster for 3 turns.

S1.name: Poison Blast
S1.description: Attacks with an explosion of poisonous energy, with a 70% chance to inflict poison for 2 turns. Cannot trigger counterattacks. Attacks two enemies when Endless Nightmare is on cooldown.

S2.name: Nightmare Illusion
S2.description: The illusion remains throughout the battle. Increases Attack and Defense of the caster by 10% each time someone dies (max 5 stacks).

S3.name: Endless Nightmare
S3.description: Attacks with a nightmare crystal, stunning for 1 turn. Decreases Combat Readiness of all remaining enemies by 50% when an enemy dies.

S1.name: Key to an Oath
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a staff and recovers Health of all allies. Damage dealt and recovery increase proportional to the caster's max Health.

S2.name: Light Pillar
S2.description: Invokes a pillar of light, removing all debuffs from an ally and recovering their Health, also granting a barrier and damage limit for 2 turns.

S3.name: Light Ascending
S3.description: Removes all debuffs from an ally with healing magic before recovering 50% of their Health and granting invincibility for 1 turn. If the target is dead, revives them with 100% Health before applying effects.

S1.name: Black Magic
S1.description: Attacks with a magic sphere, increasing caster's Combat Readiness by 15%.

S2.name: Mana Injection
S2.description: Injects an ally except for the caster with Mana, increasing Attack for 2 turns before increasing Combat Readiness by 100%.

S3.name: Desolation
S3.description: Attacks all enemies by releasing strong Mana, with a 155% chance to silence for 2 turns and decrease Defense for 2 turns. Grants an extra turn.

S1.name: Thorn
S1.description: Attacks with a sword, with a 75% chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn.

S2.name: Larkspur
S2.description: Binds all enemies with a sword, with a 100% chance to dispel one buff, before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 25% per target. This skill cannot trigger a counterattack.

S3.name: Hysteria
S3.description: Attacks the enemy indiscriminately, increasing skill cooldown to max, and increases Combat Readiness of all allies by 25%. A critical hit grants all allies skill nullifier once.

S1.name: Touch of Chaos
S1.description: Has a 100% chance to seal the enemy for 2 turns, before attacking with lightning.

S2.name: Twisted Power
S2.description: Damage suffered from a critical hit decreases by 30%. After using a basic skill, when the target is sealed, increases Attack of the caster for 1 turn before activating Burst. Burst: Attacks all enemies, and increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 25% before gaining 1 Focus.

S3.name: Dissolution
S3.description: Attacks all enemies with the power of Ilryos, with a 180% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns, and a 180% chance each to inflict two burn effects for 2 turns. Grants the caster an extra turn.

S1.name: Cruel Touch
S1.description: Attacks the enemy, with a 200% chance to inflict redirected provoke for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S2.name: Malicious Smile
S2.description: When attacked, reflects 40% of the damage suffered to the attacker. After being attacked, when Health is 30% or less, dispels all debuffs from the caster and activates Murderous Intent. Murderous Intent: Grants a barrier to the caster for 3 turns and increases Combat Readiness by 25%.

S3.name: Symphony of Agony
S3.description: Attacks the enemy by unraveling Sphere of Sadism. Damage sharing effects are ignored. Penetrates the target's Defense, but cannot trigger a critical hit. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's lost Health.

S1.name: Divine Bolt
S1.description: Attacks two enemies with shock magic, before increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 15%.

S2.name: Dimensional Rupture
S2.description: Attacks all enemies with a light sphere, with a 70% chance to dispel one buff. When the caster is granted increased Attack, grants an extra attack with the same skill.

S3.name: Blazing Eye of Kal
S3.description: Releases the power of the Ancient Book to attack all enemies before increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns. After completing Episode 3, Volatility becomes Immense Power, granting a chance to counterattack when an ally is attacked and increasing damage dealt by Dimensional Rupture.

S1.name: Get Away, Meow!
S1.description: Attacks with a morning star. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health. When the caster is granted loveliness, triggers a Dual Attack from the ally with the highest Attack.

S2.name: Meow I'm Angry!
S2.description: Attacks all enemies with a morning star while raging, with a 80% chance to make them unhealable for 2 turns. When the caster is granted loveliness, effect chance increases by 20%. Ignores Effect Resistance.

S3.name: I'm So Cute, Meow
S3.description: Wiggles tail cutely, decreasing debuff duration on all allies by 2 turns, and granting the caster immunity and loveliness for 3 turns. Grants the caster an extra turn.

S1.name: Blood Scythe
S1.description: Attacks by swinging a scythe, dispelling one buff. When dispelling the target's buff, activates Blood Retribution as an extra attack. Bloody Retribution: Attacks the enemy with a scythe, and recovers Health of all allies. Damage dealt and amount recovered increase proportional to the caster's max Health.

S2.name: Grudge
S2.description: When attacking, penetrates the target's Defense, and cannot trigger a critical hit. When an ally dies, grants a barrier and immunity to all allies for 2 turns, and grants blood aura to the caster for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health. Can only be activated once every 4 turns.

S3.name: Moon Slash
S3.description: Dispels all buffs from the enemy before attacking with a scythe. When the enemy is defeated, revives all dead allies before granting immortality for 1 turn. When the caster is granted blood aura, increases damage dealt by 100%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S1.name: Evil Spirit's Call
S1.description: Summons an evil spirit to attack the enemy, with a 75% chance to put the enemy to sleep for 1 turn. When the target is asleep after the attack, increases the caster's Combat Readiness by 20%. This skill does not trigger a Dual Attack.

S2.name: Cloud of Ruin
S2.description: Attacks all enemies by summoning storm clouds, with a 120% chance to dispel one buff before putting them to sleep for 1 turn. When this skill is available according to cooldown count, increases the caster's Combat Readiness at the end of the enemy's turn.

S3.name: Eye of Death
S3.description: Attacks with evil eyes. When the enemy is defeated, silences all remaining enemies for 1 turn. Penetrates Defense, but cannot trigger a critical hit. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's lost Health.

S1.name: Earthen Rage
S1.description: Attacks two enemies including the target with an earthen blast, transferring two debuffs from the caster to the enemy and recovering the caster's Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S2.name: Iron Will
S2.description: Immune to stun, sleep, and Decrease Hit Chance. Has a 100% chance to counterattack when the caster is debuffed after being attacked.

S3.name: Cataclysm
S3.description: Attacks all enemies by slamming rocks, with a 75% chance each to decrease Defense and Attack for 1 turn. Increases Defense of the caster for 2 turns.

S1.name: Incision
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a scythe, before healing the ally with the lowest Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's Attack.

S2.name: Annihilation
S2.description: Batters the enemy with a scythe. Grants an extra turn when the enemy is defeated. Penetrates the target's Defense by 50%, or by 100% when the target is granted a barrier. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

S3.name: Obliterate
S3.description: Calls in drones to attack all enemies, with a 100% chance to decrease buff durations by 1 turn. Increases Attack of all allies for 2 turns. When the target is granted a barrier, ignores Effect Resistance. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

S1.name: Slice to Pieces
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with scissors, with a 75% chance to decrease Defense for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

S2.name: Emergency Stitching
S2.description: Starts the first battle with 50 Fighting Spirit. When an enemy's turn ends, gains 10 Fighting Spirit for each debuff inflicted on an ally, and when the caster's Fighting Spirit is full, consumes all Fighting Spirit to dispel all debuffs from the caster and grants increased Defense and immunity for 1 turn before increasing Combat Readiness by 40%.

S3.name: Model Disqualification
S3.description: Decreases debuff durations of all allies by 2 turns and gets on stage to attack all enemies, before increasing Combat Readiness of all allies by 15%. Penetrates the target's Defense by 50%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

S1.name: Divine Punishment
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a sword, and has a 75% chance to provoke for 1 turn. Cannot trigger a critical hit, and penetrates the target's Defense by 30%. After attacking, when the caster's Health is 30% or less, grants an extra attack with the same skill.

S2.name: Desperate Resolve
S2.description: Grants immortality for 1 turn and increased Attack for 2 turns to the caster. Upon receiving lethal damage when the skill is available according to cooldown count, grants the same effects to the caster and fully increases cooldown of this skill.

S3.name: Avenger's Sword
S3.description: Slash the enemy consecutively to attack. Cannot trigger a critical hit. Penetrates the target's Defense by 30%, and when the caster's Health is 30% or less, penetrates by 70%.

S1.name: Persistent Attack
S1.description: Stabs the enemy with a spear and recovers Health of the caster. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
