S2.name: Challenging Blow
S2.description: Attacks the enemy, with a 100% chance to provoke for 2 turns.

S3.name: Sweep
S3.description: Sweeps all enemies with a spear, with a 75% chance to decrease Speed and Defense for 2 turns.

S1.name: Brawl
S1.description: Hits the enemy in the face. When used against an enemy inflicted with decreased Attack, activates Rock Smash as an extra attack. Rock Smash: Attacks all enemies. This attack receives effects that are applied to the basic skill.

S2.name: Justified Provoke
S2.description: At the start of the turn, has a 100% chance to decrease Attack of the enemy with the highest Combat Readiness for 2 turns.

S3.name: Certain Victory
S3.description: Attacks the enemy with blindingly fast speed. When used against an enemy with decreased Attack, decreases Defense for 1 turn.

S1.name: Quick Bombardment
S1.description: Rapidly fires to attack two enemies. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

S2.name: Stance Shift
S2.description: When Full Bombardment! is available at the start of the turn, takes a Shelling Stance. When Full Bombardment! is unavailable at the end of the turn, takes a Striking Stance. Can only take one stance at a time. Shelling Stance: Increases Effectiveness by 65%. Striking Stance: Increases Speed and Dual Attack chance by 65%.

S3.name: Full Bombardment!
S3.description: Boosts firepower to attack all enemies, with a 100% chance to dispel one buff, before increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns.

S1.name: Shred
S1.description: Attacks with sharp claws, with a 50% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S2.name: Danger Zone
S2.description: Combat Readiness increases by 15% at the moment the caster is attacked. Combat Readiness increases by an additional 10% when the caster's Health is 50% or less.

S3.name: Predatory Roar
S3.description: Attacks all enemies with wild energy, with a 100% chance to decrease Attack for 2 turns, and increases Defense of the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health, with additional damage increase when the caster's Health is 75% or less.

S1.name: Deliverance
S1.description: Attacks with a spear, with a 50% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. When the target is inflicted with decreased Attack, effect chance increases by 25%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S2.name: Steel Cloudburst
S2.description: Attacks all enemies with a magical spear, with a 50% chance to decrease Attack for 2 turns, before dispelling one buff. Effect chance increases by 50% when the caster's Health is 50% or less. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S3.name: Ruinous Retribution
S3.description: Attacks all enemies with a spear infused with dark energy, with a 100% chance to provoke for 1 turn, before granting immunity to all allies for 2 turns and a barrier to the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt and barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S1.name: Precision Fire
S1.description: Attacks the enemy, before a 75% chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn.

S2.name: Volley
S2.description: Shoots a volley of arrows at all enemies, with an 85% chance to decrease Combat Readiness by 20%. When the caster's Health is 80% or more, cooldown does not occur.

S3.name: Defcon
S3.description: Caster recovers 30% Health and is granted an extra turn.

S1.name: Heavy Strike
S1.description: Strikes the enemy with a blade, with a 50% chance each to dispel one buff twice.

S2.name: Butcher Corps Gear
S2.description: Damage suffered in one attack does not exceed 35% of max Health.

S3.name: Preach
S3.description: Attacks the enemy in the name of Chaos. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's lost Health. Recovers Health proportional to damage dealt.

S1.name: Disconnect
S1.description: Attacks with an axe, with a 75% chance to provoke for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S2.name: Attack Chain
S2.description: Attacks all enemies with a shockwave. With a 60% chance to provoke for 1 turn, before granting immunity to the caster for 1 turn.

S3.name: Vigorous Strike
S3.description: Smacks the enemy, with a 100% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns, before recovering 20% of the caster's max Health. When the enemy is defeated, grants an extra turn to the caster. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S1.name: Heavy Strike
S1.description: Hammers the enemy. Damage dealt is increased when the enemy is inflicted with magic nail.

S2.name: Magic Bolt
S2.description: After granting increased Attack to the caster for 3 turns, attacks the enemy, inflicting magic nail for 3 turns, and increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 50%.

S3.name: Hyper Strike
S3.description: Soars into the air and attacks the enemy, stunning for 1 turn. When the enemy is inflicted with magic nail, ignores Effect Resistance.

S1.name: Sword of Protection
S1.description: Attacks the enemy, with a 75% chance to provoke for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S2.name: Oath Shield
S2.description: After being attacked, when the caster does not have a debuff, increases Combat Readiness of the caster and the ally in the back row by 20%. Can only be activated once per turn. At the start of the first battle, increases Effect Resistance of the ally in the back row by 50% of the caster's Effect Resistance.

S3.name: Hymn of Courage
S3.description: Increases Attack of all allies for 2 turns before recovering Health of the caster. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S1.name: Relentless Strike
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a dagger. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed. When the caster is granted increased Speed, uses Whirlwind instead of Relentless Strike. Whirlwind: Attacks the enemy repeatedly, decreasing Defense for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

S2.name: Wind's Resolve
S2.description: A critical hit will increase Speed of the caster for 1 turn, with a 100% chance to grant a random buff for 1 turn. A random buff can be granted once per turn.

S3.name: Hack
S3.description: Attacks the enemy by slashing at them with daggers, granting an extra turn when the enemy is defeated. Damage dealt increases proportional to caster's Speed.

S1.name: Ambush
S1.description: Ambushes the enemy, with a 75% chance to steal one buff.

S2.name: Accurate Strike
S2.description: Attacks the enemy with an unseen blade and grants stealth to the caster for 2 turns. At the end of the turn, detonates any bleeding effects and bombs inflicted on the target.

S3.name: Baptism of Fire
S3.description: Attacks the enemy with a dagger and bomb, inflicting bleeding and planting a bomb for 2 turns, before increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 50%. When the target is a Fire elemental Hero, ignores Effect Resistance and increases Combat Readiness of the caster by an additional 50%.

S1.name: Sharp Blow
S1.description: Knocks the enemy into the air with a spear. Damage dealt increases proportional to the target's max Health.

S2.name: Spiritual Armament
S2.description: Increases Attack by 15% each time the caster attacks an enemy. Effect can only stack up to 5 times.

S3.name: Spiral Breakthrough
S3.description: Pierces the enemy with a spear, decreasing Combat Readiness by 15%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health.

S1.name: Heckle
S1.description: Attacks the enemy with a ring, with a 40% chance to stun for 1 turn.

S2.name: Eyecatcher
S2.description: Attacks the enemy with a lavish dance and steals two buffs, granting their effects to all allies, before stunning the target for 1 turn. When the target has no buffs, decreases cooldown of this skill by 1 turn.

S3.name: Curtain Call
S3.description: Crosses rings to attack the enemy, dispelling all of the target's buffs, before increasing Critical Hit Damage of all allies for 2 turns.

S1.name: Prep Ingredients
S1.description: Cuts the enemy with a cleaver, with a 50% chance to inflict bleeding for 2 turns. After attack, there's a 30% chance to activate Quick Grill.

S2.name: Quick Grill
S2.description: Attacks all enemies with the Glove Oven, recovering the caster's Health. When the enemy is bleeding, has a 100% chance to inflict burn for 2 turns. Amount recovered increases proportional to damage dealt.

S3.name: Free Dinner
S3.description: Provides all allies with a meal, dispelling all debuffs and increasing Critical Hit Chance for 2 turns before decreasing skill cooldown by 1 turn. Every time an enemy dies, the cooldown for this skill decreases by 1 turn.

S1.name: Hail
S1.description: Throws ice fragments at the enemy, with a 40% chance to stun for 1 turn.

S2.name: Nixied's Grace
S2.description: When an ally suffers a critical hit, has a 35% chance to activate Blizzard Cape. Can only be activated once every 3 turns. Blizzard Cape: Casts a barrier over all allies for 2 turns with frost magic. Barrier strength increases proportional to the ally's max Health.

S3.name: Ice Spear
S3.description: Attacks all enemies with a large block of ice, with a 190% chance to stun for 1 turn and a 190% chance to decrease Combat Readiness by 15%. Increases Speed of the caster for 2 turns.

S1.name: Mana Bullet
S1.description: Attacks with light energy, before a 75% chance to decrease Hit Chance for 1 turn.

S2.name: Celebration of Light
S2.description: Recites the Celebration of Light, recovering the Health of all allies and granting continuous healing and increased Defense for 2 turns. Amount recovered is proportional to the target's max Health.

S3.name: Light Curtain
S3.description: Recovers an ally's Health and increases their Combat Readiness by 35% with light magic. Amount recovered is proportional to the target's max Health.

S1.name: Come Here
S1.description: Strongly knees the enemy to attack, with a 75% chance to provoke for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S2.name: I Protect
S2.description: Receives 30% of damage taken by an ally in their place. Only the highest damage distribution effect will be applied. Increases max Health by 20%.

S3.name: I'm Tough
S3.description: Releases strong energy, dispelling all debuffs inflicted on the caster before granting a barrier for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

S1.name: Smash
S1.description: Attacks with an axe, with a 50% chance to cause bleeding for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health.

S2.name: Judgement
S2.description: Attacks with a sharp blow, with a 75% chance each to decrease Defense and make them unable to be buffed for 2 turns.

S3.name: Prepare Judgement
S3.description: Corrects stance, increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns and Combat Readiness by 50%.

S1.name: Strike of Provocation
S1.description: Attacks with a blunt weapon, with a 75% chance to provoke for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.

S2.name: Reclaim
S2.description: Has a 100% chance to dispel one debuff and be granted increased Defense for 2 turns when attacked. Can only be triggered once per turn.

S3.name: Finishing Attack
S3.description: Attacks with a powerful smash. Damage dealt increases by 300% when the enemy's Health is 30% or less. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense. Grants the caster an extra turn when the enemy is defeated.

S1.name: Wail
S1.description: Has a 15% chance of being granted an extra turn after attacking the enemy.

S2.name: Ill Will
S2.description: Increases Attack by 70% and Speed by 70% when the caster is debuffed. Grants immunity to stun, sleep, and provoke.

S3.name: Soul Destruction
S3.description: Attacks all enemies with magic, with a 100% chance to transfer all debuffs inflicted on the caster, and dispels all debuffs from the caster.

S1.name: Spirited Blow
S1.description: Attacks with an axe, with a 50% chance to cause bleeding for 2 turns.

S2.name: Veteran
S2.description: Attack increases by 75%, and Critical Hit Resistance increases by 70%. When attacking, cannot trigger a critical hit.

S3.name: Tenacious Strike
S3.description: Attacks with an axe, stunning for 1 turn.

S1.name: Book of Fire
S1.description: Attacks with fire magic, with a 50% chance to make unhealable for 2 turns.

S2.name: Urgent Regen
S2.description: Heals the target proportional to the caster's Attack and the target's max Health, before increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 15%. Amount recovered is doubled when the target's Health is 50% or less.

S3.name: Attack Command
S3.description: Uses strengthening magic to increase Attack of all allies for 1 turn before recovering Health and dispelling one debuff. Amount recovered is proportional to the caster's Attack and the target's max Health.

S1.name: Armor Rend
S1.description: Attacks with an axe, with a 50% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.

S2.name: Attack Chain
S2.description: Strongly slams the enemy with an axe, with a 60% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. A critical hit will have a 50% chance to extend any buffs granted to the caster by 1 turn.

S3.name: Cry of Victory
S3.description: Encourages allies, increasing Attack for 2 turns before increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 50%.

S1.name: Staff Strike
S1.description: Attacks with a staff, with a 50% chance to silence for 1 turn.

S2.name: Dark Magic
